#ClubAnnouncement

Jose Mourinho appointed new Head Coach

Jose Mourinho appointed new Head Coach | Tottenham Hotspur We are delighted to announce the appointment of Jose Mourinho as Head Coach on a contract that runs until the end of the 2022/23 season. https://www.tottenhamhotspur.com/news/2019/november/jose-mourinho-appointed-new-head-coach/
We are delighted to announce the appointment of Jose Mourinho as Head Coach on a contract that runs until the end of the 2022/23 season.

Incomings:

Tanguy Ndombele = £54m

Outgoings:

Kieran Trippier = £19.9m

Vincent Janssen = £8.1m

Josh Onomah = Free transfer

Total net spend = 74.6m

Jose Mourinho appointed new Head Coach
